text:
Hi,

I am currently having an OSGI bundle related problem with the latest release version of log4j (1.2.16) which is fixed in the latest snapshot of log4j (1.2.17-SNAPSHOT).

However, this snapshot is not in the central Maven repository (because it is a snapshot). It is also less understandably not in the Apache Snapshot Repository: http://repository.apache.org/snapshots/

Possible fixes for me would be:
-either to release 1.2.17 and deploy it to central,
-deploy 1.2.17-SNAPSHOT to the above Apache Snapshot Repository.

For now, I am stuck with using a custom compiled and deployed 1.2.17-SNAPSHOT in the "3rd party" self-hosted repository of my Repository Manager.

Yours sincerely,
Julien
